title: Shankly's 2008 Mixtapes - January
description:
Shankly&#039;s back for the new year. Where else could you find an Arcade Fire remix, a White Stripes B-side, a live Radiohead track and an Underworld cover side by side with Trouser Dog, Xiu Xiu doing Bowie and Queen, 13 minutes of World&#039;s End Girlfriend, and Ivor the Engine? 

Nowhere is the answer. Welcome back to the unique musical world of Shankly...


Dandylion Radio Festive 50 Tracks
1.	FF 01 Battles - Atlas
2.	FF 10 Von Sudenfed - Fledermaus Cant Get It
3.	FF 28 Trouser Dog ? The Amazing Apocalypse for Gary Glitter
4.	FF 48 Royal We - All the Rage
5.	FF 14 Nightingales - Wot No Blog
6.	FF 21 LCD Soundsystem - All My Friends
7.	FF 41 MJ Hibbett and the Validators - The Lesson Of The Smiths
8.	FF 15 Electrelane - To The East
9.	FF 42 Radiohead - All I Need
10.	FF 33 Lucky Soul - Lips Are Unhappy
11.	FF 27 Skream - Chest Boxing
12.	FF 18 Horowitz ? Tracyanne
13.	FF 23 My Device - Eat Lead
14.	FF 38 Laura Marling - My Manic And I
15.	FF 45 Of Montreal - Heimdalsgate Like a Promethean Curse
16.	FF 36 Kubichek ? Outwards
17.	FF 34 Bees- Listening Man
18.	FF 11 Fall - Systematic Abuse
